Package flexjson.transformer

Interface Summary
Inline  
Transformer Transformers are used to alter the values written to a Flexjson stream.

ArrayTransformer  
BasicDateTransformer  
BooleanTransformer  
CharacterTransformer  
ClassTransformer  
DateTransformer User: brandongoodin Date: Dec 12, 2007 Time: 11:20:39 PM
EnumTransformer  
HibernateTransformer  
HtmlEncoderTransformer A helper class provided out of the box to encode characters that HTML can't support natively like <, >, &, or ".
IterableTransformer  
MapTransformer  
NullTransformer  
NumberTransformer  
ObjectTransformer  
StringTransformer  
TransformerWrapper This class quietly wraps all transformers so that FlexJSON can perform certain functionality consistently across all transformers.
TypeTransformerMap This class is used to lookup type transformers from specific to generic implementation.
ValueTransformer
